text: As for the Hebronites, Jerijah 26:31 Jerijah is a variant of Jeriah; see 1 Chronicles 23:19. was the chief of the Hebronites, according to the genealogies of his ancestors. In the fortieth year of Davidâ€™s reign the records were searched, and strong, capable men were found among the Hebronites at Jazer in Gilead.
